TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataRow extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示 中的資料列。

span.span: Represents a row of data in a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 並物件為主要元件。The and objects are primary components of a . 使用物件及其屬性與方法，以擷取和評估; 以及插入、 刪除和更新中的值。Use the object and its properties and methods to retrieve and evaluate; and insert, delete, and update the values in the . 代表的實際中的物件，而包含描述的結構描述物件的。The represents the actual objects in the , and the contains the objects that describe the schema of the . 使用多載屬性來傳回或設定值。Use the overloaded property to return or set the value of a . 使用並屬性，以判斷狀態的特定資料列的值，而屬性來決定相對於其父資料列的狀態。Use the and properties to determine the status of a particular row value, and the property to determine the state of the row relative to its parent . 若要建立新，使用方法物件。To create a new , use the method of the object. 之後建立新，使用方法來加入新至。After creating a new , use the method to add the new to the . 最後，呼叫方法的供確認新增的物件。Finally, call the method of the object to confirm the addition. 如需有關將資料加入至，請參閱 < [ 將資料加入至 DataTable](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/adding-data-to-a-datatable.md)。For more information about adding data to a , see [Adding Data to a DataTable](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/adding-data-to-a-datatable.md). 您可以刪除從藉由呼叫方法，或藉由呼叫方法物件。You can delete a from the by calling the method of the , or by calling the method of the object. 方法會移除集合中的資料列。The method removes the row from the collection. 相反地，標記移除。In contrast, marks the for removal. 當您呼叫時，就會發生真正的移除作業方法。The actual removal occurs when you call method. 藉由呼叫，您可以透過程式設計方式檢查哪一個資料列會標示為待移除之前會實際刪除它們。By calling , you can programmatically check which rows are marked for removal before actually deleting them. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 刪除 DataRow](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/datarow-deletion.md)。For more information, see [DataRow Deletion](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/datarow-deletion.md). ## Examples 下列範例會建立新藉由呼叫方法物件。The following example creates a new by calling the method of the object. span.span: Commits all the changes made to this row since the last time was called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當叫用，則隱含地呼叫方法來結束任何編輯。When invoking , the method is implicitly called to end any edits. 如果的資料列已加入或修改會變成未變更。If the of the row was Added or Modified, the becomes Unchanged. 如果已刪除，會移除資料列。If the was Deleted, the row is removed. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 方法。See the method for more information. 類別也有方法，這會影響到整份資料表所做的變更。The class also has an method which affects changes made to the whole table. 如需詳細資訊和程式碼範例示範如何接受或拒絕個別的資料列的變更，請參閱[AcceptChanges 和 RejectChanges](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/acceptchanges-and-rejectchanges.md)。For more information and a code example that demonstrates how to accept and reject changes to individual data rows, see [AcceptChanges and RejectChanges](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/acceptchanges-and-rejectchanges.md). ## Examples 下列範例會先建立新包含一個資料行，然後建立單一。The following example first creates a new with one column, and then creates a single . 作為是建立、 新增、 修改和刪除，其列印。As the is created, added, modified, and deleted, its is printed. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataRow.AcceptChanges Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataRow.AcceptChanges Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataRow.AcceptChanges Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataRow.AcceptChanges Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void BeginEdit() cil managed

summary.span: 在 物件上開始編輯作業。

span.span: Starts an edit operation on a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法將進入編輯模式。Use the method to put a into edit mode. 在此模式中，事件會暫時停用，讓使用者對多個資料列中的變更，而不觸發驗證規則。In this mode, events are temporarily suspended, letting the user make changes to more than one row without triggering validation rules. 比方說，如果您必須確定資料行的總金額的值等於借方的值，而且信用額度的資料列中的資料行，您可以將每個資料列放置於編輯模式，若要暫停的資料列的值驗證，直到使用者嘗試認可的值。For example, if you must make sure that the value of the column for a total amount is equal to the values for the debit and credit columns in a row, you can put each row into edit mode to suspend the validation of the row values until the user tries to commit the values. 當使用者變更的資料繫結控制項; 值隱含地呼叫方法方法會隱含呼叫，當您叫用方法物件。The method is called implicitly when the user changes the value of a data-bound control; the method is called implicitly when you invoke the method for the object. 在此編輯模式時，儲存的原始和新表示法提議的值。While in this edit mode, the stores representations of the original and new proposed values. 因此，只要尚未呼叫方法，您可以擷取的原始或建議的版本並傳遞`DataRowVersion.Original`或`DataRowVersion.Proposed`如`version`參數屬性。Therefore, as long as the method has not been called, you can retrieve either the original or proposed version by passing either `DataRowVersion.Original` or `DataRowVersion.Proposed` for the `version` parameter of the property. 您也可以藉由叫用來取消任何編輯在此時方法。You can also cancel any edits at this point by invoking the method. 若要查看的資料列是否包含的原始或建議的值，請呼叫方法。To see if the row contains an original or proposed value, call the method. > [!NOTE] > 方法會暫時停止事件，但`delete`作業則否。The method temporarily suspends events, but the `delete` operation does not. ## Examples 此範例會建立簡單與其中一個到五部物件，和。The example creates a simple with one and five objects, and a . A事件處理常式也會加入資料列的值正在變更時進行監視。A event handler is also added to monitor when the row's value is changing. 叫用後上現有的資料列的條件約束和事件會暫時停用，並列印的原始和建議值。After invoking on the existing rows, the constraint and event are temporarily disabled and the original and proposed values are printed. 會再次叫用來將兩個資料列設定為相同的值。The is again invoked to set two rows to the same value. 當呼叫時，在相同的值會強制執行。When is called, the is enforced on the identical values. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataRow.BeginEdit Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataRow.BeginEdit Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataRow.BeginEdit Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataRow.BeginEdit Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果新增的資料列時，會變成`Detached`當您呼叫時，將會移除資料表中的資料列和。If the of the row is Added, the becomes `Detached` and the row is removed from the table when you call . 會變成`Deleted`使用之後上的現有方法。The becomes `Deleted` after you use the method on an existing . 它會保持`Deleted`直到您呼叫。It remains `Deleted` until you call . 此時，從資料表中移除。At this time, the is removed from the table. 您不應該呼叫在 foreach 迴圈中逐一查看時物件。 should not be called in a foreach loop while iterating through a object. 修改集合的狀態。 modifies the state of the collection. 可以還原已刪除的資料列，叫用。A deleted row can be undeleted by invoking . > [!NOTE] > 方法會暫時停止事件，但刪除作業則否。The method temporarily suspends events, but the delete operation does not. ## Examples 下列範例會建立簡單兩個資料行與 10 個資料列。The following example creates a simple with two columns and ten rows. 刪除數個後的項目方法，其中一個資料列藉由叫用還原。After deleting several items with the method, one of the rows is undeleted by invoking . remarks.format: ## Remarks `HasErrors` 會傳回`true`如果有的話物件的資料列中包含錯誤，或如果屬性不是空的字串。`HasErrors` returns `true` if any object in the row contains an error, or if the property of the is not an empty string. 驗證資料時，您可以設定錯誤的資料列中的任何資料行上。When validating data, you can set an error on any column in a row. 這類的資料行中顯示時控制項，來通知使用者該資料行是錯誤的紅色驚嘆號標示。Such a column, when displayed in the control, is marked with a red exclamation point to signal to the user that the column is in error. 使用任何資料行上設定錯誤。Use to set an error on any column. 使用和`GetColumnsInError`方法來傳回資料行，但發生錯誤。Use the and `GetColumnsInError` methods to return columns with errors. 方法會清除所有資料列的錯誤。The method clears all errors for the row. ## Examples 下列範例會使用尋找錯誤。The following example uses the to look for errors. 如果資料列的錯誤，方法會傳回發生錯誤，它可以解決的資料行的陣列。If the row has errors, the method returns the array of columns with errors that can then be resolved. 方法接著會呼叫清除所有錯誤。The method is then called to clear all errors. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您只能建立或更新的資料列之後您呼叫,方法; 同樣地，方法必須呼叫以認可編輯。You can only create or update a row after you call the method; similarly, the method must be called to commit the edit. 在您呼叫後方法，並在呼叫之前方法中，值會儲存提議的原始和新的內部表示。After you call the method, and before you call the method, internal representations of the original and new proposed values are stored. 因此，直到您呼叫，您可以使用`version`引數來指定哪個版本的資料行的值，您需要請`DataRowVersion.Original`或`DataRowVersion.Proposed`。Therefore, until you call the , you can use the `version` argument to specify which version of a column's value you need, either the `DataRowVersion.Original` or `DataRowVersion.Proposed`. 不過，一旦您呼叫方法中，資料行的版本會還原為`DataRowVersion.Original`。However, as soon as you call the method, the version of the column reverts to `DataRowVersion.Original`. 如果新資料列，您也可以傳遞`DataRowVersion.Default`參數來擷取資料行的預設值。If the row is new, you can also pass `DataRowVersion.Default` for the parameter to retrieve the column's default value. 當傳遞`DataRowVersion.Current`，屬性會傳回目前值，其版本可能是任何內容。When passing `DataRowVersion.Current`, the property returns the current value, whatever its version may be. > [!NOTE] > 當您變更資料繫結控制項的值或隱含地呼叫方法物件加入至;方法會隱含呼叫，當您呼叫下列方法： 方法物件，方法物件，或方法。The method is called implicitly when you change the value of a data-bound control or when a object is added to the ; the method is called implicitly when you call the following methods: the method of the object, the method of the object, or the method. 相反地，列舉型別`Current`傳回的資料之後的版本已呼叫方法。By contrast, the enumeration `Current` returns the version of the data after the method has been called. `version`引數不應混淆與屬性。The `version` argument should not be confused with the property. `version`引數描述相對於資料行的原始值的資料行所包含之資料的狀態。The `version` argument describes the state of the data that is contained by the column relative to the column's original value. 屬性會描述相對於其父代的整個資料列狀態。The property describes the state of the whole row relative to its parent . 如果發生例外狀況中，當您設定屬性時，會產生例外狀況事件。When you set the property, an exception is generated if an exception occurs in the event. 如果這是立即編輯時，請參閱可以產生的例外狀況。If this is an immediate edit, see for the exceptions that can be generated. ## Examples 下列範例會取得目前透過資料行的值屬性物件。The following example gets the current value of a column through the property of the object.
